_header: This is the stone cut of the hill
_description: James Ryman, The Prophecy of Emmanuel — six six-line stanzas (ababbb, including a 3-line refrain, ‘Nomen eius emanuell / Scripture full welle to vs doth tell / Nomen eius emanuell’, and burden: ‘A chielde is borne with vs to dwell / Nomen eius emanuell’

CULEe112.First Lines:
This is the stone kut of the hilleThus seith the prophete
                    Daniell…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Scripture full well to vs doth tellNomen eius
                    Emanuell
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.

             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen

Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 45; 1977, 37.
